sentence.Network_en: She was taken to hospital, apparently amnesiac and shocked.
sentence.Network_cn: 她被送往医院，好像是受了惊吓出现了失忆。

sentence.Network_en: Rudolph said no more. Apparently he was a man of few words.
sentence.Network_cn: 鲁道夫没再说话。看来他是个寡言少语的人。

sentence.Network_en: Apparently there's a very hush-hush project under way up north.
sentence.Network_cn: 貌似这里往北的地方有个非常机密的项目正在进行。

means.word_mean: 表面上看,可能地,可行地

entry.def: You use apparently to indicate that the information you are giving is something that you have heard, but you are not certain that it is true.

example.ex: Apparently the girls are not at all amused by the whole business...
example.tran: 据说女孩们觉得整件事情一点也不好笑。

example.ex: Oil prices fell this week to their lowest level in fourteen months, apparently because of over-production.
example.tran: 据说因为产量过剩，这个星期石油价格跌至14个月以来的最低点。

entry.def: You use apparently to refer to something that seems to be true, although you are not sure whether it is or not.

example.ex: The recent deterioration has been caused by an apparently endless recession...
example.tran: 看似永无止境的经济衰退导致了最近的恶化。

example.ex: Rudolph said no more. Apparently he was a man of few words.
example.tran: 鲁道夫没再说话。看来他是个寡言少语的人。

sentences.sentence: "irrigation often produces bumper crops from apparently desert land"
"the child is seemingly healthy but the doctor is concerned"
"had been ostensibly frank as to his purpose while really concealing it"-Thomas Hardy
"on the face of it the problem seems minor"

means.word_mean: 2. unmistakably (`plain' is often used informally for `plainly');

sentences.sentence: "she was in bed and evidently in great pain"
"he was manifestly too important to leave off the guest list"
"she has apparently been living here for some time"
"I thought he owned the property, but apparently not"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =bring birth,表示"生产,生出小孩"; 2. =come in sight,表示"看见;出现"; 3. =get ready,表示"准备;安置"; 4. =equal,表示"平等"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 一胎多子的, 经产的, 非初产的, [植]多产的
stems_affixes.word_buile: multi多+par生产,生出小孩+ous……的→多生产的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 初产的, 初次分娩的
stems_affixes.word_buile: primi=prim第一,最初+par生产,生出小孩+ous……的→adj.初产的, 初次分娩的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 每次产一个卵的; 每胎生一子的
stems_affixes.word_buile: uni单一+par生产,生出小孩+ous……的→生出一个

stems_affixes.value_cn: 表面上的,貌似真实的;显然的,明明白白的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ap一再+par看见;出现+ent……的→一再能看见→显而易见
trans横穿+par看见;出现+ent……的→横穿过去看得一样清楚→透明的
in不+separable[adj.可分离的, 可分的]→adj.不能分的
se分离+par置+able……的→adj.可分离的, 可分的
se分离+par置+ate表形容词→adj.分开的, 分离的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无准备的, 即席的, 尚未准备好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un无+prepare准备+ed……的→adj.无准备的, 即席的, 尚未准备好的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可比较的, 比得上的
stems_affixes.word_buile: compare比较+able……的→adj.可比较的, 比得上的
compare比较+ative表形容词→adj.比较的, 相当的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 奇数的,不成对的,不平等
stems_affixes.word_buile: im不+parity[n.同等;奇偶]→adj.奇数的,不成对的,不平等
non不,无+par平等+eil→无平等的→无与伦比的
apparent显然的+ly表副词→adv.显然地
separate分开+ly表副词→adv.个别地;分离地
comparative[adj.比较的, 相当的]+ly表副词→adv.比较地, 相当地
par生产,生出小孩+ent……人→n.父母,母亲;[n.]双亲;父母

stems_affixes.value_cn: 透明, 透明度, 幻灯片, 有图案的玻璃
stems_affixes.word_buile: transparent[[adj.透明的]]→n.透明, 透明度, 幻灯片, 有图案的玻璃

stems_affixes.value_cn: 器械,器具,仪器;机构,组织
stems_affixes.word_buile: ap=ad+par准备;安置+atus表名词→准备好用的东西→设备
par准备;安置+ade表名词→本为部队训练场[即准备打仗得地方],引申为排队游行
prepare准备+ation行为,过程→n.准备, 预备
re再+pair=par准备;安置→重新准备好→修理
com一起+pari=par平等+son→一起平等→比较
dis不+parity同等→n.不同,差异
par平等→n.一对, 一双
par平等+ity表名词→n.同等;奇偶
par准备;安置+ade表名词→本为部队训练场[即准备打仗得地方],引申为排队游行
par准备;安置+ade表名词→本为部队训练场[即准备打仗得地方],引申为排队游行
pre预先+par准备;安置+e→预先准备好
re再+pair=par准备;安置→重新准备好→修理
com共同+par平等+e→平等的放在一起→比较
dis不+par平等+age动词后缀→不平等对待→轻视

Sentence.sentence: Apparently the bus company will be laying off its employees if they can't reach an agreement on wages by midnight.
Nobody will read papers on apparently ridiculous theories.

sentences.en: He was apparently much surprised at the news.
sentences.cn: 他对那个消息显然感到十分惊异。
